architectural_decisions.title: Use FastAPI for building the REST API
architectural_decisions.rationale: FastAPI offers high performance, ease of use, and built-in support for asynchronous operations.

architectural_decisions.title: Implement Repository Pattern for data access layer
architectural_decisions.rationale: The repository pattern helps in decoupling the data access logic from business logic, making the code more modular and testable.

architectural_decisions.title: Utilize Dependency Injection for managing dependencies
architectural_decisions.rationale: FastAPI's dependency injection mechanism simplifies dependency management and improves code organization.

architectural_decisions.title: Define custom exceptions using FastAPI's HTTPException
architectural_decisions.rationale: HTTPException provides a structured way to handle errors, enabling clear error responses and improved debugging.

architectural_decisions.title: Employ Stripe, PayPal, and Square for payment processing
architectural_decisions.rationale: Supporting multiple payment providers increases flexibility and reduces vendor lock-in.

architectural_decisions.title: Use JWT tokens for authentication
architectural_decisions.rationale: JWT tokens offer secure and stateless authentication, reducing server load and improving scalability.

architectural_decisions.title: Enforce authorization at various endpoints
architectural_decisions.rationale: Authorization ensures that only authorized users can access specific resources, maintaining security and integrity.

architectural_decisions.title: Send order confirmation emails using SendGrid
architectural_decisions.rationale: Automated notifications improve user experience and reduce manual intervention.
